name: Tom Poland
what_you_do: Tom Poland is an internationally acclaimed inbound lead generation specialist and bestselling author.
who_you_serve: Business owners across 193 different industries in four continents.
social_proof: Bestselling author, shared international speaking platforms with Michael Gerber, Richard Koch, and Brian Tracy. More than 2,000 business owners have been through his programs.
business_focus: Helping business owners generate more leads and grow their businesses.
service_provided: Business coaching, marketing advice, lead generation
